brief:
This class allows you low-level access to an audio buffer to create, access,
 manipulate and play back sound samples.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Changes the amplitude/volume of the player.

methods.name: channels()
methods.desc: Returns the number of channels in the audiosample as an int (1 for mono, 2 for stereo).

methods.name: cue()
methods.desc: Cues the playhead to a fixed position in the audiosample.

methods.name: cueFrame()
methods.desc: Cues the playhead to a fixed position in the audiosample.

methods.name: duration()
methods.desc: Returns the duration of the audiosample in seconds.

methods.name: frames()
methods.desc: Returns the number of frames of the audiosample as an int.

methods.name: jump()
methods.desc: Jump to a specific position in the audiosample while continuing to play (or starting to play if it wasn't playing already).

methods.name: jumpFrame()
methods.desc: Jump to a specific position in the audiosample without interrupting playback.

methods.name: loop()
methods.desc: Starts the playback of the audiosample.

methods.name: play()
methods.desc: Starts the playback of the audiosample.

methods.name: playFor()
methods.desc:
Starts the playback of the audiosample for the specified duration or to the
 end of the audiosample, whichever comes first.

methods.name: rate()
methods.desc: Set the relative playback rate of the audiosample.

methods.name: resize()
methods.desc: Resizes the underlying buffer of the audiosample to the given number of frames.

methods.name: sampleRate()
methods.desc: Returns the underlying sample rate of the audiosample.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Pan the soundfile in a stereo panorama.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Set multiple parameters at once.

methods.name: stop()
methods.desc: Stops the playback.

methods.name: position()
methods.desc: Get current sound file playback position in seconds.

methods.name: positionFrame()
methods.desc: Get frame index of current sound file playback position.

methods.name: percent()
methods.desc: Get current sound file playback position in percent.

methods.name: pause()
methods.desc: Stop the playback of the sample, but cue it to the current position.

methods.name: read()
methods.desc: The underlying data of the audiosample can be read and written in several different.

methods.name: write()
methods.desc: The underlying data of the audiosample can be read and (over)written in several different ways.

description:
This class allows you low-level access to an audio buffer to create, access,
 manipulate and play back sound samples.
 
 If you want to pre-load your audio sample with an audio file from disk you
 can do so using the SoundFile subclass.
name: AudioSample

parameters.name: frames
parameters.description: the desired number of frames for this audiosample

parameters.name: stereo
parameters.description:
whether to treat the audiosample as 2-channel (stereo) or not
            (default: false)

parameters.name: frameRate
parameters.description: the underlying frame rate of the sample (default: 44100)

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
an array of float values to be used as this audiosample's sound
            data. The audiosample will consequently have as many frames as the
            length of the given array.
